title.value: Роль овощеводства в обеспечении продовольственной безопасности Республики Беларусь
The role of vegetable growing in ensuring of food security of the Republic of Belarus
The role of vegetable growing in ensuring of food security of the Republic of Belarus

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Vorobeva, T.A., Ministry of Agriculture and Foodstuffs, Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Food security of the country represents the level of provision of population with ecologically friendly and useful home-made foodstuffs at affordable prices. The level of food security of the country depends on agriculture's development and is considered to be political stability and national independence. The role of vegetable growing in providing food security of the Republic of Belarus is examined. The analysis of the production and consumption of vegetables by population of the country is made. The main objectives of food self-sufficiency of vegetable production have been defined. Vegetables' producing per capita in the Republic of Belarus is analyzed; total consumption of vegetables is evaluated; production of vegetables in the Republic of Belarus according the enterprises' categories is evaluated.
